title: "Powerful artificial-intelligence ban possible, government adviser warns"
excerpt: "Some very powerful artificial-general-intelligence systems may eventually have to be banned, a member of the government's AI Council has said. Marc Warner, also boss of Faculty AI, said AGI already needed strong transparency and audit requirements as well as more inbuilt safety technology."
